featured.text: This extinct volcano is considered the wettest spot on earth, with almost 500 inches of rainfall each year.
Typhoon Maggie brought to I-lan County a huge amount of rainfall, much greater than the _____ rainfall of the season in the area.
Dogs bark before earthquakes; cattle predict rainfall by sitting on the ground.
The sea snakes’ population distribution is closely related to rainfall.
The week-long rainfall has ______ landslides and flooding in the mountain areas.

other.text: The rainfall changes much with seasons. 48.
What is the rainfall condition of Kauai? (A)
The rainfall concentrates in some spots.

definition.zh_def: 降雨量，指在特定時間內降落的雨水量。
definition.en_def: The amount of rain that falls in a specific area over a specific period.
definition.example: The rainfall this month has been higher than average.
